channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:

um could u tell me the name of the java i need? i click that link and it says

For sale products are now available through alternate venues. In order to continue, you must select your for sale or free product from the Download Center home page. Please click on the “Download Center” link at the top of the page.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

You need Java, preferably this one.

https://sdlc6c.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=790D8CD6B2A0FABB124E46DF7974C21A

download the windows online installation if u have windows. Install it.

Then right click your compile.bat and click edit. Replace all the coding there with:

@echo off
title - Kissed The Shadows Compile -
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_12\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

do the same with runserver:

@echo off
title - Kissed The Shadows runserver -
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_12\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

These codes only work with the java I sent u.

Read full topic
